titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt from the overtime requirements of that Act certain individuals employed in the cleaning of carpets or fabrics.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

bill.summary: 9/16/1987--Introduced. Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt from the overtime requirements of such Act individuals employed in the cleaning of carpets or fabrics at the site where the carpets or fabrics are located.
